EmailTemplate.name: DataArchiva : Enable Archiva API
EmailTemplate.subject: Enable Archiva API for archive from detail page button and list button
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear **name**,
This is a system generated mail from Salesforce DataArchiva application. Data archiving of a configured object was not started and details are given below. Please contact support@dataarchiva.com with this mail attached. support@dataarchiva.com with this mail attached.
Organization ID : **OrgId**
Object Name : **object**
Date : **Date and time**
Failure cause : **Message**
Thanks, DataArchiva System
